sentence.Network_en: Who is the Valedictorian of your class?
sentence.Network_cn: 谁代表你们班级在毕业典礼上致别辞?
她是大学毕业典礼的告别演讲者.

比尔·盖茨在哈佛大学毕业典礼上的演讲 2007 年6 月7 日 President Bok, ...I guess that makes me valedictorian(告别演说者) of my own special class.
well , as this year ' s valedictorian ., 嗯 ． 作为今年的毕业演讲代表.
She went on to become valedictorian (致告别词的学生代表)of her local school and attended Spelman College ,Sarah Lwrence College by scholarship,graduating.

entry.tran: （中学或大学毕业典礼上）致告别词的优秀毕业生
entry.def: A valedictorian is the student who has the highest marks in their class when they graduate from high school, college, or university, and who gives a speech at their graduation ceremony.

means.word_mean: 1. the student with the best grades who delivers the valedictory at graduation
